name: Wonderway
description:
Wonderway is a puzzle game where the direction of gravity can be changed. Every element in this game interacts with gravity in its own way. You can change the position of items by arrows and portals, utilize cores of energy doors to create passages or blocks, use arrow-shifters to control the direction of arrows, and even separate the gravity of character from the space. Explore many more mechanics and get to the goal by moving and manipulating every items in the levels.

The game has over 170 hand-crafted puzzles which experiment with the game's mechanics in a multitude of ways. Each puzzle contains at least one new idea, which showcases the wonder of the way to the goal. Hope you enjoy exploring and solving these puzzles.
